動物用藥品名稱: 默之爾雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎不活化混合疫苗
製造廠名稱: LOHMANN ANIMAL HEALTH INTERNATIONAL (MAINE BIOLOGICAL LABORATORIES DIVISION)
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染新城病及傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: STANDARDIZED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS 0.010ML; STANDARDIZEDBRONCHITIS VIRUS: (A) MASSACHUSETTS TYPE 0.012ML (B) ARKANSAS TYPE0.008ML;STERILE SALINE 0.111ML; AQUEOUS EMULSIFIER (40% SOLUTION)0.0088ML; ADJUVANT(OIL PHASE) 0.350ML; MERTHIOLATE (10% SOLUTION)0.0002ML; 每一劑量含病毒量：NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS: 10^7.7EID50;BROCHITIS: (A) MASS. TYPE: 10^6.9EID50 (B)ARK. TYPE: 10^6.9EID50.
